metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47085 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in ostree before 2022.7 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via the print_panic function in repo_checkout_filter.rs.

notes.Note: alexmurray> the affected code does not appear to be present in the ubuntu ostree package

criterions.comment: ostree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
